Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) that uses a pyrolytic carbon fuel was developed.
Titulo: Solid state fuel storage and utilization through reversible carbon deposition on an SOFC anode

Sentencas: The pyrolytic carbon fuel is supplied by the thermal decomposition of pure, dry methane on the anodes.
Titulo: Solid state fuel storage and utilization through reversible carbon deposition on an SOFC anode

Sentencas: This SOFC can generate electrical power in repeated power cycles.
Titulo: Solid state fuel storage and utilization through reversible carbon deposition on an SOFC anode

Sentencas: Compared to Ni/YSZ anodes, nickel/gadolinium doped ceria (GDC) anodes yield 8.6 times higher power density and 29 times more effective carbon mass used as fuel.
Titulo: Solid state fuel storage and utilization through reversible carbon deposition on an SOFC anode

Sentencas: Pyrolytic carbon-fueled SOFCs will permit the design of portable power units having the convenient fuel storage mode and will be used as the hydrogen generator during the charging of pyrolytic carbon fuel.
Titulo: Solid state fuel storage and utilization through reversible carbon deposition on an SOFC anode
